response.overview: To those who've never tried anal sex it might seem odd to say that there's any joy in the practice at all. To those who are converted to its merits, however, there's nothing better than getting penetrated from the rear...as this collection of slutty mistresses are only too eager to demonstrate. Sluts like Renata, Lucky and Lucy, who can't wait to get their arses stretched to the max by some of the biggest, thickest schlongs in the biz. Given the smiles on their faces as they take every inch to the hilt, you'd think every one of their Christmases had come at once; a sentiment that's repeated over and over until the final credits. All in all, a five-star rearguard frenzy that will have any anal lover creaming themselves into an all-time stupor.
response.title: The Joys Of Anal Pleasure
